actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Natural Resources, Ways and Means, the Judiciary, Transportation and Infrastructure, Armed Services, and Oversight and Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Environment, Manufacturing, and Critical Materials

official_title: Recognizing the duty of the Federal Government to create a Green Real Deal.

summary.text: This resolution recognizes the duty of the federal government to create a Green Real Deal to achieve robust, economy-wide greenhouse gas emissions reductions.

titles.title: Recognizing the duty of the Federal Government to create a Green Real Deal.
